landing.intro:
You decide what you want to learn.
We show you how to get there.
landing.missionStatementText: We enable people to learn, independent of their situation in life and the resources at their disposal. Knowledge gives us the power to choose. We give you the power to choose your own path.
landing.crowdsourcingExplanation:
The Learn Graph collects votes about the dependency of knowledge on other knowledge. This creates a network of dependencies, a weighted, directed graph, which anyone can navigate to learn about these dependencies.
We choose an open knowledge approach: Everyone gets full non-commercial access, for free. We’re here to support you in your journey.
landing.crowdsourcingCallToAction: That means users like you build this knowledge base, and everyone benefits from it. Contribute your knowledge today, by voting on existing connections or creating new entries!
